msg: Uses LinkedList to avoid problems with sorting under different JVMs

author: jukka
msg: JCR-3620: JCA deployment descriptor for Apache Geronimo

author: breser
msg: Update build-svn-deps-win.pl to support Debug builds.
To generate a debug build add DEBUG=1 to the command-line.
(build_pcre, build_zlib, build_openssl, build_bdb): Adjust to build a Debug
(httpd_fix_makefile): Fix the install of pcre that httpd does to not break
when doing a Debug build since the DLL is named pcred.dll.
(find_bdb_lib): Detect the debug lib when doing a Debug build.
(httpd_fix_debug): New function to apply a fix that unbreaks the Debug build.
(build_httpd): Use httpd_fix_debug(), use the right target for Debug or
(build_serf): New function, patch Serf to work with Debug build of OpenSSL.
